ygData.subject: Re: Need the site pls
ygData.msgSnippet: I use Graphics Workshop. I find the interface to be rather klunky and weird, but in terms of power and flexibility it can t be beat.  It s been around a long
ygData.messageBody:
I use Graphics Workshop. I find the interface to be rather klunky and
weird, but in terms of power and flexibility it can't be beat. It's
been around a long time, too.
You should be able to find it at
http://www.mindworkshop.com/alchemy/alchemy.html
